entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UB Build Failure: sdk - Workloads build producing same versions as emsdk build #48360
  • The SDK should provide a RID-negotiation Task for other tools to use #48352
  • A broken Template #48349
  • SourceLink creates incomplete URLs for GitHub Enterprise #48348

Closed

  • Consider basic support for launchSettings for the new dotnet test #47548
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `dotnet test` logic for MTP for splitting TargetFrameworks #48158

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dead code in UsageReport #48359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • --interactive should actually default to true in user-facing situations. #48353
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Switch to using `darc vmr forwardflow` #48351
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Inline DotNetBuild.props settings into the repo #48355
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 9.0.2xx
  • dotnet CLI: Reorganize dotnet.Tests folder structure + other #48280
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Remove compiler toolset opt-out and move properties #48350
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet test for MTP] Throw exception if the project doesn't produce executable #48065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support --no-launch-profile-arguments in dotnet test for MTP #48304
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • dotnet test for MTP: Normalize TFMs #48306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48330
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make 'dotnet run file' tests runnable on localized machines #48264
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable arm64 DEB tests #48319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Updating breaking change guidance #48184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48279
    untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sign check to remove the exclusions but only check on sign… #48275
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Skip second build if possible with 'dotnet run file' #48318
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Do not build SDK installers in source-build #48322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Promote `NuGet.Client` builds during official CI #48311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.105 April 2025 Updates #48274
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
